title: Save Scoles / Kyssa Stewf Farv
content:
Submitted by [Jared Benson](http://web.archive.org/web/20091124180602/http:/typophile.com/user/3 "View user profile.") : 17.Sep.2003 8.52pm As many of you know, in a few days the type world's beloved Stephen Coles is pulling anchor and relocating to [Sweden](http://web.archive.org/web/20091124180602/http:/www.stewf.com/) of all places. To show our love and support we decided to pay homage to Stephen with a [pixeltee](http://web.archive.org/web/20091124180602/http:/typophile.pixeltees.com/).



Click here to check out the Stewf Tee >
Through the wonders of high-quality thermal transfer magic, you can have Stephen arrive at your door. Buy the Stewf tee so Stephen can afford to take a nice Swedish girl out for some [Jansson's Temptation](http://web.archive.org/web/20091124180602/http:/www.recipesource.com/ethnic/europe/swedish/janssons-temptation1.html). Any royalties from sales go to Stephen. It's his face on there, after all; it's the least we can do. * * * Got an idea for a Typophile Pixeltee? [Send us artwork.](mailto:pixeltee@typophile.com) 128x128, 72dpi, web-safe palette.
author: Jared Benson
